title: Binary Love
overview: Zhou Lin Lin is one of those students who do well in some subjects, but fail with others. Thanks to a thorough curriculum compiled for her by the excellent student Fan Yu Ke, Lin Lin not only manages to catch up, but also to enroll in the best university in the country.It would seem that after the entrance exams, the paths of Zhou Lin Lin and Wang Yu Ke will diverge, but unexpectedly they were accepted to the same specialty at the university. The story of their relationship continues.Based on Po Po's novel "Peking University Students".
